name: Knight's Vendetta
description:
You are a knight. Your castle has been taken over by an evil cult while you were participating to a military expedition. You have to fight them to get your castle back.

This is a not very elaborate RPG (there is no magic at all, for example). I just wanted to make a basic RPG since... a long time. I made it with Ren'Py, like my previous game.
